training.title: AI Model Training & Prediction
training.description: Train your exclusive medical AI diagnostic model in just a few simple steps. The system will automatically handle complex technical details.
training.stepDesc1: Please briefly describe what type of medical images or conditions you want this AI model to identify
training.targetPlaceholder: For example: Train an AI model that can identify diabetic retinopathy in fundus images.
training.targetHint: Detailed descriptions help the system better optimize training parameters
training.stepDesc2: Please upload your prepared medical image dataset, the system supports ZIP format files
training.guideStep1: Create folders and group images by category (e.g., normal, abnormal)
training.guideStep2: Ensure each category has at least 50 images
training.guideStep3: Package all folders into a ZIP file and upload (currently limited to 30 minutes for uploading)
training.guideStep4: (Optional) Download a public demo dataset for RDR (Referable Diabetic Retinopathy) detection from Google Drive.
training.uploadPrompt: Click to upload or drag files here
training.uploadHint: Supports ZIP format, maximum file size 1GB
training.stepDesc3: The system has automatically optimized training parameters for you, you can also adjust as needed
training.modelNameHint: It is recommended to use meaningful names for easy management and identification
training.selectBaseModelHint: Choose a pretrained foundation to fine-tune. Different models suit different datasets.
training.baseModelEasyDesc: General-purpose Easy-EyeFM with balanced performance and speed.
training.baseModelRetFoundDesc: RetFound specialized for retinal fundus analysis and medical datasets.
training.baseModelEyeFMDesc: EyeFM optimized for lightweight deployment with faster inference.
training.timeVariation: Actual time may vary due to data complexity
training.trainingSuccessDesc: Your dedicated AI model is ready and can be used
training.trainingInProgressDesc: The system is processing your data, please wait...
training.noModels: You don't have any completed trained models yet
training.resultPlaceholder: AI diagnosis results will be displayed after selecting model and uploading image
training.datasetManagementDesc: Manage and organize your training datasets
training.predictTimeout: Prediction timeout, please try again later
training.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this model?
training.selectImageFile: Please select an image file first

models.noModelsDesc: You haven't trained any models yet, please train a model for diagnosis first
